text: avar parannu: i kalikalute garbhasayannalilullat nannalile anunnalkk matramullatum, nannalute bharyamarkk nisid'dhamakkappettatumanâ€Œ. at cattatanenkilea avarellam atil pank parrunnavarayirikkum. avarute i jalpanattin takka pratiphalam avan (allahu) valiye avarkk nalkunnatanâ€Œ. tirccayayum avan yuktimanum sarvvajnanumakunnu
